subject: Help requested: updating javadoc for junit.framework classes
msgSnippet: Hi, all. There s a 3-year-old request to update the JUnit javadoc so that the junit.framework classes are included (and properly marked as deprecated). Is
messageBody:
Hi, all.

There's a 3-year-old request to update the JUnit javadoc so that the
junit.framework classes are included (and properly marked as deprecated).
Is there anyone out there that would have the time and energy to take this
on?

https://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/81

Thanks,

David Saff


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
